node.title: Unit Testing dotnet new Templates
node.description: It's difficult to know if your 'dotnet new' based project will work if they have lots of options, in this post I show how to unit test them.

node.title: Custom Project Templates Using dotnet new
node.description: How to create project templates using dotnet new and the template.json file. How to share project templates by creating NuGet packages.

node.title: Securing the ASP.NET MVC Web.config
node.description: The web.config file is insecure in the default ASP.NET MVC project template. This post talks you through securing the ASP.NET MVC Web.config file.

node.title: Custom Visual Studio Project Templates
node.description: A guide to creating custom Visual Studio project templates in .zip and VSIX form and submitting them to the Visual Studio Gallery, so it can be downloaded.
